title: Pregnant Gogglebox Australia star Sarah Marie Fahd shares photos of her baby shower
text:
Gogglebox Australia star Sarah Marie announced in May that she and hubby Matty Fahd were expecting their first child, a baby boy.

And ahead of her November due date, the 32-year-old hosted a lavish safari-themed baby shower at her home in New South Wales.

Taking to Instagram, the brunette beauty shared several snaps of the glamorous affair, which saw her backyard transformed into a whimsical wildlife wonderland.

So perfect! Gogglebox Australia star Sarah Marie Fahd (pictured) hosted a lavish safari-themed baby shower at her home in New South Wales

In one of the photos, Sarah Marie flaunts her burgeoning baby bump in front of a lush plant wall that is surrounded by various pastel balloons and African animals.

'Still obsessing over this set up by @eternityeventhire @royalballoonz,' Sarah Marie captioned the photo, which also included the hashtag #33weeks.

A follow-up snap shows the bubbly mum-to-be cutting into a lavish two-tiered fondant cake, which was created by Petite Decor.

Proud mumma! In one of the photos, Sarah Marie (pictured) flaunts her burgeoning baby bump in front of a lush plant wall that is surrounded by various pastel balloons and African animals

Say cheese! Another photo shows Sarah Marie (pictured) smiling sweetly at the camera, while resting one hand on her ever-growing baby bump

'I'm still on such a high after celebrating the soon to be arrival of baby Fahd at my baby shower over the weekend,' the 32-year-old wrote.

'I cant believe how perfect everything was and I’m so grateful for everyone who was part of it. I cant wait to show you all more of the whole set up it was INCREDIBLE!'

Several other photographs, which appeared on the event organiser's Instagram on Thursday, show the bespoke setup, which included a gigantic teepee-style tent.

No expense spared! Several other snaps, which appeared on the event organiser's Instagram, show the bespoke setup, which included a gigantic tee-pee-style tent (pictured)

Child at heart! Taking to Instagram, the brunette beauty shared several snaps of the glamorous affair, which saw her backyard transformed into a whimsical wildlife wonderland

Guests could either sit inside the tent, or sit at one of the many low-lying wooden tables, which came complete with plush cushions and elaborate carpets.

Floral centrepieces in mason jars added to the rustic party theme, and video footage showed guests were also greeted with oversized toy blocks that spelled out: 'Baby.'

The elaborate affair comes after Sarah Marie and Matty announced they were expecting their first child together in a heartwarming gender reveal Instagram post.

'The family is about to have a new couch potato as we we welcome our first human son into the world this November,' the reality TV pair wrote.
description: Ahead of her looming November due date, Gogglebox Australia star Sarah Marie Fahd hosted a lavish safari-themed baby shower at her home in New South Wales.
authors: Mark Brook For Daily Mail Australia
